info.description: The Personalization API is a read-only REST API that retrieves data about your visitors and their segments.The base URL for all requests is https://engage-api.kenticocloud.com/v3/. All requests to the API must be made securely with HTTPS with TLS 1.2 and authenticated with a valid API key.
info.title: Personalization API v3

get.summary: Retrieve the names of segments that the specified visitor belongs to.
get.description: A Segments object containing the codenames of all segments the visitor belongs to.        If the specified visitor is not a member of any segments, an empty Segments object is returned.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: The ID of your project. Example: `569030c7-52a5-44f5-a243-c5285b3eb24e`.

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: The ID of a visitor. Example: `e3e9e191a12b9257`.

200.description: A collection of segments the specified visitor belongs to.
